Criteria: Nominal. The unique identifier of the product. Missing values are not possible due to the database structure.
Nominal. The category of the product, one of 6 values (Housing, Food, Toys, Equipment, Medicine, Accessory). Missing values should be replaced with “Unknown”.
Nominal. The type of animal the product is for. One of Dog, Cat, Fish, Bird. Missing values should be replaced with “Unknown
Ordinal. The size of animal the product is for. Small, Medium, Large. Missing values should be replaced with “Unknown”.
Continuous. The price the product is sold at. Can be any positive value, round to 2 decimal places. Missing values should be replaced with the overall median price.
Continuous. The value of all sales of the product in the last year. This can be any positive value, rounded to 2 decimal places Missing values should be replaced with the overall median sales
Discrete. Customer rating of the product from 1 to 10. Missing values should be replaced with 0.
Nominal. Whether customers repeatedly buy the product (1) or not (0) Missing values should be removed.
